title: Insert Link freezes randomly
content:
I use insert link all the time and it will work great for weeks and then randomly freezes. I have read so many threads about Band-Aid solutions for this as it seems to be a well established problem - so come one TB- solve it so it doesn't happen!! Anyway these are the solutions that have worked best for me

  1. Use the esc key when your email freezes - this unfreezes the email instead of having to force close thunderbird - and then you can chose to paste the http link instead of insert.
  2. If you have two screens - move your email to the opposite screen and try again - I found that the link screen dialogue box seems to have a preferred space between itself and the email (so incongruous)
  3. Click Alt+spacebar to open the move dialogue box which allows you to move the email and sometime reset the location of the link dialogue box
  4. Turn off hardware acceleration in settings general (at the bottom)
  5. close thunderbird and open in safe mode by holding shift whist clicking TB. at the prompt: 'Reset toolbars & controls', 'Make changes & restart'.

But this should not be an ongoing problem - its super annoying and needs to be addressed
creator: leanne3

title: Error accessing nyu.edu email from Thunderbird client
content:
I was having trouble adding my NYU email account to Thunderbird and browsing the forums I found this post with my exact same issue.

I just wanted to open a thread because I found a solution to my problem by following one the comments in the original post.

The configuration you should use to configure the account should be as follows (as of Nov. 2024),

Incoming server: imap.gmail.com on port 993 with SSL/TLS using OAuth2 Incoming server username: your NetID without the trailing "@nyu.edu".

Outgoing server: smtp.gmail.com on port 465 with SSL/TLS using OAuth2 Outcoming server username: your NetID (as before)

Once you input this configuration you will be asked to log-in through Google, and from there on everything should work as intended.

Hope this wil be useful to someone.
creator: rodrigoa.tsaavedra

title: Emails won't be deleted, but appear after a few seconds again
content:
I have an IMAP-Account on ZOHO (which work like a charm until 3 days ago). But since 3 days I have the issue that I can not delete some mails in this account.

If I delete them (or marked it as spam, or as read) they turn back in a few seconds as new unread messages.

I've already try the following: 1. Start in Troubleshoot mode 2. Close TB, go to Imap-Folder and delete the Trashbin (I've read this hint in a forum, as the trasbin-file may be corrupt). 3. Go to settings of the account settings (right Mouse Button > Settings > General Information > Repair Folder 4. Checked the Developer Console for errors... no errors shown

Non of those solved it.

So I decide to deep-check what happend and found following: 1. I've deleted an incoming, unread email from November the 7th. Immediately it was shown again as "new Mail" for TODAY 8:00 AM (see attachment: Thunderbird_Inbox) 2. I've looked into my Webmailer and found that the Email is still there (see attachment Webmailer_zoho)

I've done the same for another Email: 1. It is shown as unread, and I've deleted it in THunderbird 2. It appears again immediately - but this email appear with the same In-Date: 12.11.24 16:12 3. BUT in my Webmailer it's shown in the trash-bin

So something very strange is going on here!! Any Idea how to debug and fix this?
creator: rethus

title: Win 11 home, Thunderbird problem z aktualizacją!!!
content:
Mam Win 11 home, Thunderbird przy próbie aktualizacji wyświetla komunikat, że muszę ponownie uruchomić komputer aby dokończyć wcześniejszą aktualizację, robię to ale komputer przez ok 5 min. niby uaktualnia ale kończy się to ponownym komunikatem o konieczności ponownego uruchomienia aby dokończyć wcześniejszą aktualizację. Próbowałem usunąć cały program w panelu sterowania ale przy próbie tej czynności znowu pojawia się ten komunikat. Ściągnąłem najnowszy wersję programu ale przy próbie instalacji znowu pojawia się komunikat o konieczności ponownego uruchomienia w celu dokończenia wcześniejszej aktualizacji. Reasumując: nie mogę używać poczty bo przy każdej aktualizacji Thunderbirda muszę na nowo ją konfigurować, nie mogę usunąć programu, nie mogę wgrać/nadpisać najnowszej wersji. Pytanie: jak usunąć Tbd i wgrać najnowszą wersję? Proszę pomóżcie mi wybrnąć z tej czarnej du...dziury. Pozdrawiam

Sławomir

title: File INBOX Multipli - profili thunderbird
content:
Buongiorno a tutti,

Sul mio Thunderbird di lavoro gestisco molteplici account aziendali. Nello specifico 2 account Gmail; 4 ArubaMail; 1 Virgilio; 4 PecPoste

Spesso Thunderbird mi va in errore dicendo che "Non è riuscito a compattare le cartelle"

Andando a spulciare nella cartella Profilo di Thunderbird mi sono reso conto che per ogni account esistono molteplici file INBOX (per un account fino a 90 file INBOX!) (questo accade sia per gli account Gmail, che ArubaMail) e molteplici account POSTA-INVIATA (questo accade per l'account Virgilio).

Questi file mi portano ad occupare un enorme spazio su disco.

Ho letto in Forum esteri che questi duplicati si creano quando Thunderbird prova a compattare una cartella ma il processo si interrome e/o non va a buon fine

Come posso porcedere? Posso cancellare questi file che mi saturano il disco?

Allego una foto esemplificativa Grazie!

title: Refresh the mail box
content: I found that there were some new mails in my mailbox on my iphone, but I couldn’t find them via Thunderbird on my computer. The latest mail in the mailbox of Thunderbird is a week ago while the latest one should be two days ago. Thanks for reading.
creator: 2db6zw4jsv

title: Open folder blocked off.
content: How to rectify.
creator: keithwebb

title: Lost mail
content: Hi, I've been using Thunderbird for years. I have thousands of emails organized into folders based on at least 8 different email addresses. Today, all the mail from one of the folders disappeared, even though no intervention was made. The restore folder command didn't help either. The size shows 0 kb (it should contain many years of correspondence). I looked in the File explorer in the Profile folder, but both the cur and tmp folders are empty. It's not among the deleted items (of course I didn't delete them, I just checked there). I ran scandisk on the drive, no errors. I searched for email addresses in Thunderbird, it found emails from 2 years ago, but it could not display, it said "cannot be displayed". I have no more ideas. Please help me. Thanks.
creator: honti

title: Trouble Opening Messages in Tab, Double-click opens Reply window
content:
I am using Tbird 128.4.3esr 64-bit in Windows 11.

It's been running okay, but today I changed the viewing window to classic view/list view from card view.

Each time I try to open a message (which is supposed to open in a new tab) by double-clicking, Tbird opens up a reply-to-message window instead, with a warning on it saying: "A unique identity matching the From address was not found. The message will be sent using the current From field and settings from identity <<user identity here>>."

Thank you for any assistance.

Hergrace
creator: hergrace

title: richiedo il ripristino degli account dei miei due figli e della moglie
content: Richiedo il ripristino dell'account di tre miei famigliari, persi non si sa per qual causa. Supposto siate in grado di farlo e ne abbiate voglia, sarò lieto di fornirvi i dati necessari.
creator: Aldomarola

title: Preview on Mac not working
content: Aloha from Kauai, Since doing the upgrades, probably for the past month now, the Preview function in the message window no longer works. How can I, and others I believe, get it to working again?
creator: thayne1

title: Advanced Search
content:
I'm using Thunderbird 132.0.2 on a Mac, OSX 15.0.1 (24A348)

I'm looking for away to do an advanced search of thousands of emails for a text string "Bob Williams Jr" or a number "10,000". Is there a way to do this? If I do the first I get every email with Bob or Williams or JR, and 10,000 gives me every email with 000.
creator: jim4turner

title: Recovering emails
content: My hard drive crashed a couple weeks ago. I was able to set up the email I had, but I lost all my current emails and contacts. I would like to get some help recovering these two items
creator: townofe

title: Thunderbird appears to be running Message Filters on the Trash Folder
content:
Thunderbird 128.4.2 on Windows 11 Pro 24H4

Has anyone else seen this problem? Does anyone know how to fix it?

Messages that I delete - they get moved to the Trash Folder - are getting un-deleted.

I have Message Filters that move incoming messages to folders.

I also have a Saved Search ("virtual") Folder that matches only on "Status is New". The folder is configured to include the "Location" Column to list which folders the new messages are in.

When I notice that this "new messages" Saved Search Folder has messages in it - the New Messages Count Icon increases - I open it. I delete some messages in it. The Trash Folder only briefly has NEW messages in it - the New Messages Count Icon on the folder appears, then it disappears. Then these NEW messages re-appear in the virtual folder with the Location Folder they had before deleting them. And the messages are indeed back in those folders.

I don't understand this. It *looks* like the Message Filters are running on the Trash Folder and moving NEW messages (back) into folders and out of the Trash Folder. But filters should not run on the Trash Folder.
creator: mozilla.org.firefox.sync

title: I am still experiencing a problem when attempting to send emails on Thunderbird.
content: When I try to send an email on Thunderbird, I get a message following my attempt that my message failed to send, and it asks for a new password. When I put in the new password that I have just changed from my internet provider at Comcast, the failure to send keeps repeating over and over.
creator: dickerydoc

title: mail sparite dopo crash
content:
Salve stavo esportando delle mail, il sistema è creshato e sono spariti 2476 mail.

come posso recuperarle?

title: Import accounts from Android to desktop?
content: I like the new Thunderbird app for Android and the ability to import settings from the desktop version. But I wonder -- is the reverse possible? Can I import the same accounts from the Android version to a desktop instance?
creator: br.ta.2818

title: Forwarding emails
content: I am changing my email account from consolidated.net to startmail.com. Can I have email from the old account automatically forwarded to startmail after I remove everything from consolidated?
